metadata.Title: CVE-2022-23990 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Expat (aka libexpat) before 2.4.4 has an integer overflow in the doProlog function.

notes.Note: sbeattie> paraview uses system expat xotcl uses system expat poco uses system expat gdcm uses system expat audacity uses system expat simgear uses system expat coin3 uses system expat as of 4.0.0~CMake~6f54f1602475+ds1-1 sitecopy uses system expat since 1:0.16.0-1 (dapper!) rodrigo-zaiden> libxmltok does not include in_eldec in dtd, so, it is not affected.

criterions.comment: coin3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
